page.title: 14Our School
page.content: Newburgh School is on the Cupar Road. The main building was built in 1825 and the newer part was erected in 1925.There are 7 classes and a Nursery Class. I am in class 7. There are 196 pupils in the school, 9 teachers, a Nursery Nurse, 1 dinner lady, a secretary, a janitor and a patrol crossing lady. The school day starts at 9am and the first break is at 10:30am till 10:50am. Dinner is at 12:30pm till 1:30pm and the school day ends at 3:15pm. We have music lesson once a fortnight with our music teacher Mrs Murdoch. Also once a fortnight we get drama. Our main subjects are maths and language. Every year in June we have outings and sports. On the last day we have an end of term concert when every class except the Nursery Class takes part. Primary 7 do a comical play.
